title: Who first brought the concept of rebirth? - Quora

response.answer_text: We don’t know. But if you look around you, you can see it for yourself. Then look at the image below and see the difference between the dry and wet season on the African savannah. Birth-death-rebirth or rejuvenation is a well established cycle of all matter, whether plants, animals, stars, galaxies or humans.

upvoters.user_href: /profile/横田-チャタジー-スワルナーリ-Swarnali-Chatterjee-Yokota
